title: ChangeMgmt - Send Read Only mode Communications to Business Users
time_sequence: CA - FILES RECEPTION AND PARENT FILES INTEGRATION

task_list.instruction_title: Send a communication to all SECLI CH users that SECLI CH PROD will be in Read-only mode and in Isolation from Thursday (18:00 PM) until Saturday (7 AM) on migration weekend 1.
Send a communication to all PG/NEW ERA users that APPWAY DCOB and DCUR workflows are unavailable from Thursday (18:00 PM) until Saturday (7 AM) on migration weekend 1.
Send a communication to all ACB users that ACB will be unavailable from Thursday (18:00 PM) until Saturday (7 AM) on migration weekend 1.
Send a communication to all Tax users that Tax will not be up to date from Thursday (18:00 PM) until Saturday (7 AM) on migration weekend 1.
